channel.title: [Paying!][Help][637] NPC's Which Open Shops [Dementhium based]
channel.description:
I created a custom shop using NPC 946, and i added whatever i wanted to using ShopEditor, and in dialoguemanager.java I've added the following:
[code] case 666: World.getWorld().getShopManager().openShop(player, 946); return false;[/code]
I've also put up a specified spot which it spawns, which works, just when i press the NPC it doesn't do anything. No shop opens, just "incoming opcode 28" being printed in chat. I don't understand what i did wrong or what else i need to modify, seeing that i'm new to 637, it would i suppose be "understandable".
If somebody can help me A.S.A.P. that would be great.
P.S. Yes... I did compile.
Using TorvaPKz V4 (Dementhium Based) 637 loading 639.
I am now willing to pay.

item.title: [Paying!][Help][637] NPC's Which Open Shops [Dementhium based]
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

NOTE: I have never used this base and I’m speaking from what I’ve read about it.

I believe you add the shop in this method:

private void option1(final Player player, Message in) {

Otherwise, you’re trying to send a Dialogue which should be done like this:

sendDialogue(player, EMOTE, ID, ##, "Message");

I think that’s the problem because when you’re making a shop using a 317, you have to make the NPC do something once clicked. You’re not doing that or incorrectly in this case.

If you need further help PM me and I’ll look into it further.

Read full topic

item.title: [Paying!][Help][637] NPC's Which Open Shops [Dementhium based]
item.dc:creator: @M.I.A M.I.A.
item.description:
@M.I.A wrote:

I created a custom shop using NPC 946, and i added whatever i wanted to using ShopEditor, and in dialoguemanager.java I’ve added the following:

case 666: World.getWorld().getShopManager().openShop(player, 946); return false;

I’ve also put up a specified spot which it spawns, which works, just when i press the NPC it doesn’t do anything. No shop opens, just “incoming opcode 28” being printed in chat. I don’t understand what i did wrong or what else i need to modify, seeing that i’m new to 637, it would i suppose be “understandable”.

If somebody can help me A.S.A.P. that would be great.

P.S. Yes… I did compile.

Using TorvaPKz V4 (Dementhium Based) 637 loading 639.

I am now willing to pay.

Read full topic
